duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver direct patient care in collaboration with the Registered Nurse.
Perform tasks that do not require nursing judgements or administration of medications.
Accountable for the patient care they deliver and adhere to standard of care and practice.
Participate in orientation, continuing education, and updates and maintains knowledge and skills related to specific areas of expertise.
Complete population specific competency annually on populations served as identified in scope of care and service.
Maintain current BLS/CPR certification and First Aid training.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent with medical background, mechanical aptitude and manual dexterity preferred.
